thread.title: Daniel Jacobs leans on Andre Ward and a 'Hulk' mind-set while readying for Gennady Golovkin
thread.title_full: Daniel Jacobs leans on Andre Ward and a 'Hulk' mind-set while readying for Gennady Golovkin

author: Lance Pugmire
title: Daniel Jacobs leans on Andre Ward and a 'Hulk' mind-set while readying for Gennady Golovkin
text:
Daniel Jacobs leans on Andre Ward and a 'Hulk' mind-set while readying for Gennady Golovkin Gennady Golovkin, Daniel Jacobs Bebeto Matthews / Associated Press Gennady Golovkin, left, is 36-0 with 33 knockouts, but Daniel Jacobs, right, who has survived a battle with cancer, thinks he can prove "I’m the best middleweight out there." Gennady Golovkin, left, is 36-0 with 33 knockouts, but Daniel Jacobs, right, who has survived a battle with cancer, thinks he can prove "I’m the best middleweight out there." Sights and sounds from Saturday's Dodgers FanFest at Dodger Stadium. Caption Tom Brady leads Patriots to epic Super Bowl comeback victory 
After a first half in which he played like that impostor in a Tom Brady mask, the New England Patriots quarterback put on a Super Bowl performance for the ages Sunday, leading his team back from a 25-point deficit to beat the Atlanta Falcons in overtime, 34-28.

Chargers owners Dean and John Spanos talk about the team as it prepares to relocate to L.A.
